descriptionPreview:
Problem Description

The Caribbean world series is about to start, with eight teams competing from eight different leagues. I need an interactive website that pulls in each player's stats during their respective winter ball season to reach the Caribbean world series and past statistics pulled from Baseball reference

Acceptance Criteria
A list of leagues and teams can be found here make sure to include all statistics for the team and individual players that is availble

Technical Details
This will be a standalone project, so any coding language and data storage solutions are acceptable, with clear guidelines on adding or refreshing data in the future.

Timelines / Milestones
The target release is Feb 1st, if completed on 1/27 will add a 50% bonus.
title: Caribbean World Series interactive Player Dashboard
